title: Synchronisation failed in Light client
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.8.23-stable`
OS & Version: Linux
Commit hash : `c942700427557e3ff6de3aaf6b916e2f056c1ec2`

#### Problem
After upgrading geth from 1.8.22 to 1.8.23 I cannot synchronize geth for light client. 
It returns this error:
`Synchronisation failed, retrying         err="block header download canceled (requested)"
`
